reference.article-title: Quality Assessment QA1: Is the live approach appropriate? QA2: Is the live mechanism explained in the study? QA3: Is the approach validated through an empirical experiment? QA4: Are the results of the study compared with the results from other studies? Data Collected Title of the study, year of publication, source (conference or journal's name or if it was published on arXiv), source evaluation (evaluation by Core or Quartile), full reference, main research topics, author(s) information (author(s) name and country where their institution is lo-cated), number of citations based on Google Scholar Citations, quality assessment score
reference.author: S I Rankings
reference.journal-title: Publication on the research field of live software development. IC3: Publications including enough explanation about the research findings. IC4: Publication years between 2010 and 2023
